Speaker.name: Octavia_Sad
Speaker.line1: This is not what I expected.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Sad
Speaker.line1: Does the Express not have any lighter options?

Choices.Choice2: Admit that there're more suitable choices

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: I'm afraid there are none, ma'am.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Upset
Speaker.line2: Do not try to deceive me, waiter.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Sad
Speaker.line1: But I'll give you the benefit of the doubt this time.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line2: there are indeed more suitable options, ma'am.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Sad
Speaker.line2: You've made a poor choice, dear.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line1: Let's move on to the pastry and see what you got for me.
